text: The Beginning After the End Episode 12 release date and time is right around the corner. The previous episode showcased Arthur losing to Director Goodsky in a duel, but the latter sees his potential. Further, he agrees to learn from her in exchange for the security of his family. Here’s all you need to know about the release time of the 12th episode of The Beginning After the End and where you can watch it. When is the The Beginning After the End Episode 12 release date & time? The episode’s release date is June 18, 2025, and its release time is 11:30 PM JST, 7:30 am PT, and 10:30 p.m. ET. Check out its release times in the U.S. below: TimezoneRelease DateRelease TimeEastern TimeJune 18, 202510:30 p.mPacific TimeJune 18, 20257:30 am Where to watch The Beginning After the End Episode 12 You can watch The Beginning After the End Episode 12 via Crunchyroll. Crunchyroll is a premier anime streaming platform that offers a vast library, including popular series like Jujutsu Kaisen, One Piece, and My Hero Academia. It has become a central hub for anime enthusiasts worldwide. The platform’s free version has limited content access with ads, while the paid version offers unlimited content viewing without ads. What is The Beginning After the End about? The anime follows the story of a king who finds himself on a new journey in a fantasy world after his death. The official synopsis for The Beginning After the End is as follows: “After a mysterious death, King Grey is reborn as Arthur Leywin on the magical continent of Dicathen. Although he enters his second life as a baby, his previous wisdom remains. He begins to master magic and forge his own path as the years go by, seeking to correct the mistakes of his past life.”
html:
The Beginning After the End Episode 12 release date and time is right around the corner. The previous episode showcased Arthur losing to Director Goodsky in a duel, but the latter sees his potential. Further, he agrees to learn from her in exchange for the security of his family.

Here’s all you need to know about the release time of the 12th episode of The Beginning After the End and where you can watch it.

When is the The Beginning After the End Episode 12 release date & time?

The episode’s release date is June 18, 2025, and its release time is 11:30 PM JST, 7:30 am PT, and 10:30 p.m. ET.

Check out its release times in the U.S. below:

Where to watch The Beginning After the End Episode 12

You can watch The Beginning After the End Episode 12 via Crunchyroll.

Crunchyroll is a premier anime streaming platform that offers a vast library, including popular series like Jujutsu Kaisen, One Piece, and My Hero Academia. It has become a central hub for anime enthusiasts worldwide. The platform’s free version has limited content access with ads, while the paid version offers unlimited content viewing without ads.

What is The Beginning After the End about?

The anime follows the story of a king who finds himself on a new journey in a fantasy world after his death.

The official synopsis for The Beginning After the End is as follows:

“After a mysterious death, King Grey is reborn as Arthur Leywin on the magical continent of Dicathen. Although he enters his second life as a baby, his previous wisdom remains. He begins to master magic and forge his own path as the years go by, seeking to correct the mistakes of his past life.”
